titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the D.P. Brother. Oldsmobile advertising proofs, 1938 RL.11513
titlestmt.author: Richard Collier

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-12-20 16:13:52 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History

did.abstract: Advertising agency founded in 1934 in Detroit, Michigan. Collection consists of Oldsmobile (General Motors) proof pages removed from an agency binder. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Advertising agency founded in 1934 in Detroit, Michigan by D.P. Brother, a Vice-President with the Campbell-Ewald agency. Acquired by Leo Burnett 1967 and operated as a subsidiary until folded into Leo Burnett operations 1993.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The D.P. Brother. Oldsmobile advertising proofs were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 2016.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], D.P. Brother. Oldsmobile advertising proofs, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Richard Collier, Sept. 2017 Accessions described in this collection guide: 2016-0326

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections:
Gary P. and Sandra G. Baden collection of print advertisements;
Roy Lightner collection of antique advertisements

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of Oldsmobile (General Motors) proof pages removed from an agency binder. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
